## Biography

Post-Doctorate in Sociology and Anthropology (UFRJ) and PhD in Social Communication (PUC-RS). Professor at the Department of Social Communication and the Postgraduate Programs in Communication/Professional Master's Degree at UFMA. Currently coordinates two research projects relating the themes of Communication, Migration and Work. Researcher at the research groups [ObEEC (UFMA/CNPq)](https://portalpadrao.ufma.br/ppgcompro/grupos-de-pesquisa/obeec); [GPECOM (UFMA/CNPq)](https://portalpadrao.ufma.br/ppgcompro/grupos-de-pesquisa/grupo-de-pesquisa-e-estrategias-em-comunicacao), [GEPTS (UFMA/CNPq)](https://gepfs.ufma.br) and [GPTEC (UFRJ/CNPq)](https://www.gptec.org).


:::
